name: Harris Tweed Tina Tassle Clutch
description:
Christmas- The last day for ordering to ensure delivery for Christmas is 17 December.

Our Tina Tassle Clutch is made from the luxurious and exclusive Harris Tweed.

Harris Tweed is hand woven by the islanders at their homes in the Outer Hebrides of Scotland, and made from pure virgin wool, also dyed and spun in the Outer Hebrides.

This is the perfect clutch if you are looking for something a little bit glamorous, but with an edge.  The lining is made from a pink silk for a pop of colour.

The large handmade tassle is made from a soft italian leather.
1
FREE UK SHIPPING

name: Harris Tweed Hector Satchel
description:
Christmas- The last day for ordering to ensure delivery for Christmas is 17 December.

Our Hector Satchel is made from the luxurious and exclusive Harris Tweed.  This tweed is made from beautiful earthy tones of green and brown.

Harris Tweed has been hand woven by islanders at their homes in the Outer Hebrides of Scotland, and made from pure virgin wool, also dyed and spun in the Outer Hebrides.

This is the perfect bag for carrying some laptops, books and papers. The shoulder strap is made from a beautiful black veg tan and is adjustable, so it can be worn across the body as well as on the shoulder.

The bag is lined with a charcoal wool and has two large pockets, perfect for storing your essentials. The buckles on the front of the satchel have magnetic snaps attached for ease.

This is a very cool bag that will last a lifetime.

Various sizes available.

FREE UK SHIPPING

Our Phone Cover is made from the luxurious Harris Tweed.

Harris Tweed is hand woven by islanders at their homes in the Outer Hebrides of Scotland, and made from pure virgin wool, also dyed and spun in the Outer Hebrides.

The cover has been padded to ensure your phone is protected.

The lightweight cover hugs your phone and the leather strap closure secures it in place when your on the move.

The leather strap on the back is perfect for holding your headphones, or can be used to loop onto your belt.

Available for all phones. Please advise of your phone model when ordering.

FREE UK SHIPPING

name: Harris Tweed Green Rory Backpack
description:
Christmas- The last day for ordering to ensure delivery for Christmas is 17 December.

Our Green Rory Backpack is crafted from the luxurious Harris Tweed.

Harris Tweed is hand woven by islanders at their homes in the Outer Hebrides of Scotland, and made from pure virgin wool, also dyed and spun in the Outer Hebrides.

The backpack has a large leather pocket on the front as well as two on the inside, perfect for storing your essentials. There is also a padded interior pocket, perfect for storing your iPad or laptop.

The rear straps and top handle are made from a waxed brown leather and are adjustable.

This is the perfect bag for dashing about the town to walking in the country.

Lightweight, water-resistant and highly durable, this is a very cool bag that will last a lifetime.

This item's measurements are:
Width 15.5" / 36cm
Height 17" / 43cm
Depth 5" / 12cm
Top Handle Length 10" / 25cm

FREE UK SHIPPING
